long_description:
Inputs
------
default : DataFrame|Matrix
    Input to use as the table for column extraction
short_description: The EXTRACT_COLUMNS node takes an input dataframe/matrix and returns a dataframe/matrix with only the specified columns.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.type: list of str or list of int
parameters.description: The columns to extract from the input dataframe

returns.description: DataFrame or Matrix with only the specified columns
